alert.note: Alert for Meigs; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 1:44PM CDT until June 05 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 244 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midtown, or near Rockwood, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingston, Rockwood, Fairview, Midtown, Harriman and Eagle Furnace. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 350. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
